original_text: Then Abraham ran to his cows. He chose a very nice young cow. He gave it to his servant. The servant quickly prepared it for the men to eat.
korean_text: 아브라함이 또 가축 떼 있는 곳으로 달려가서 기름지고 좋은 송아지를 잡아 하인에게 주니 그가 급히 요리한지라

sentences.original_text: Then Abraham ran to his cows
He chose a very nice young cow
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 아주 좋은 어린 소를 선택했습니다

sentences.original_text: He gave it to his servant
